artist: Painter: After Hyacinthe Rigaud; Engraver: Pierre Dupin; Publisher: Michel Odieuvre
description: bust length portrait turned left and looking out right at viewer; long curly hair; wearing cloak with white neck cloth; in an oval frame on a pedestal
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in plate below image: Hiacinth Rigaud Pinxit   P. Dupin sculpsit / CHARLES SIMONNEAU DESSINATEUR / et Graveur ordinaire du Cabinet du Roy / Mort le 22 Mars 1728 age de 89 ans. | Below image in black A Paris Chez Odieuvre Md. d Estampes es Quay de l\"Ecole vis-a-vis le cote de la Samaritaine a la belle Image / A.P.D.R. | in pencil on sheet and at top of mount: 402
title: Portrait of Charles Simonneau
